summary: All requirements are fully implemented. The diff shows complete implementation of both PDF export image embedding (REQ-1) and colorful formatting restoration (REQ-2) with proper design code sorting, green headers, and image fetching logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Karigar detail page navigation and full-page view
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Do not change any other features' and mentions preserving 'all existing order management, dashboard, and design mapping features'. The diff shows addition of KarigarDetail.tsx as a new page with navigation from KarigarsTab, which changes the karigar viewing workflow.

hallucinated_features.description: Row-level click selection and visual highlighting for selected rows
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly state 'Altering order table row selection or bulk actions' should not be modified. The diff shows OrderTable.tsx was modified to add entire-row clickable selection and blue background highlighting for selected rows.
